name: From Death comes Life
description:
Death is good - death creates life. In this mini-leisure game your focus is just keeping your little forest as healthy as possible. Trees grow and grow old. To facilitate new life, death is key. Make space for new trees by burning down old and withered ones!

Made for 5k celebration jam

Mouse Input:

- Right click hold -> Rotate

- Left click -> next action

Game is very much still in development, unfortunately some outer circumstances prevented it to get more polished and rounded up. I still like the concept very much and would be glad to hear opinions!
